scripts.tsc-build: rimraf ./dist && tsc -p lib && copyfiles -u 1 lib/**/*manifest.json lib/**/*.svg lib/**/i18n.json lib/**/*.png dist
scripts.build: rimraf ./dist && tsup && copyfiles -e lib/**/*tsconfig.json -u 1 lib/**/*.json lib/**/*.svg lib/**/i18n.json lib/**/*.png dist
scripts.package:win: npm run build && node scripts/package.js --platform win
scripts.package:mac: npm run build && node scripts/package.js --platform mac
